name: Farming Simulator 2013: Ursus
summary: Extend your gaming experience with the new official extension of Farming Simulator 2013 and Farming Simulator 2013 Titanium Edition! This DLC contains new tractors and equipment of the Ursus brand, such as the Ursus C-45, Ursus C-330, Ursus 5044, Ursus 8014H, Ursus 11024, Ursus 15014 and many more!
